title: Physics of the Earth
description: Introduction to methods and observational data used to determine solid Earth structure and to understand the dynamical processes driving surface deformation and plate tectonics.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and PHYS 2212 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
